title: HAP 30 - Dualist Personality - Anton Wilhelm Amo
itunes:title: HAP 30 - Dualist Personality - Anton Wilhelm Amo
description: Anton Wilhelm Amo, brought to Germany from his native Ghana, defends a rigorous dualism of mind and body. Was this philosophy connected to his African origins?
